document.full_text: chocolate treats will continue to get a little less chocolaty if the cost of the key ingredient cocoa rises further and the long-term supply concerns become a reality, one u.s. manufacturer told reuters.
document.title: supply woes, high prices changing chocolate treats
lines_and_colors: chocolate treats will continue to get a little less chocolaty if the cost of the key ingredient cocoa rises further and the long-term supply concerns become a reality, one u.s. manufacturer told reuters.
